description: This file defines API route handlers for task management in a FastAPI application, including creating, retrieving, updating, completing, and deleting tasks, along with functions for converting database rows to output schemas.

methods.name: TaskOut row_to_task_out(row)
methods.description: Converts a SQLAlchemy row into a TaskOut data object.

methods.name: TaskOut create_task(payload: TaskCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db_session))
methods.description: Creates a new task in the database and returns the created TaskOut.

methods.name: List[TaskOut] list_tasks(db: Session = Depends(get_db_session))
methods.description: Retrieves all tasks from the database.

methods.name: TaskOut get_task( task_id: int = Path(..., description="ID of the task to retrieve", ge=1), db: Session = Depends(get_db_session), )
methods.description: Retrieves a specific task by its ID.

methods.name: TaskOut update_task( payload: TaskUpdate, task_id: int = Path(..., description="ID of the task to update", ge=1), db: Session = Depends(get_db_session), )
TaskOut complete_task( task_id: int = Path(..., description="ID of the task to mark as completed", ge=1), db: Session = Depends(get_db_session), )
None delete_task( task_id: int = Path(..., description="ID of the task to delete", ge=1), db: Session = Depends(get_db_session), )
methods.description: Deletes a task by its ID.

ctags.name: complete_task
ctags.signature: ( task_id: int = Path(..., description="ID of the task to mark as completed", ge=1), db: Session = Depends(get_db_session), )

ctags.name: create_task
ctags.pattern: /^def create_task(payload: TaskCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db_session)) -> TaskOut:$/

ctags.name: delete_task
ctags.signature: ( task_id: int = Path(..., description="ID of the task to delete", ge=1), db: Session = Depends(get_db_session), )

ctags.name: get_task
ctags.signature: ( task_id: int = Path(..., description="ID of the task to retrieve", ge=1), db: Session = Depends(get_db_session), )

ctags.name: update_task
ctags.signature: ( payload: TaskUpdate, task_id: int = Path(..., description="ID of the task to update", ge=1), db: Session = Depends(get_db_session), )
